SELECT * FROM pms_product WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND status = 1 ORDER BY created_at DESC

SELECT *,
( CASE WHEN LOWER(name) = LOWER(#{keyword}) THEN 100 WHEN LOWER(name) LIKE CONCAT(LOWER(#{keyword}), '%') THEN 80 WHEN LOWER(name) LIKE CONCAT('%', LOWER(#{keyword}), '%') THEN 60 ELSE 0 END + CASE WHEN LOWER(description) LIKE CONCAT('%', LOWER(#{keyword}), '%') THEN 30 ELSE 0 END + CASE WHEN LOWER(category) LIKE CONCAT('%', LOWER(#{keyword}), '%') THEN 20 ELSE 0 END ) as relevance_score
0 as relevance_score
FROM pms_product WHERE status = 1 AND stock > 0
AND (
LOWER(name) LIKE CONCAT('%', LOWER(#{keyword}), '%') OR
LOWER(description) LIKE CONCAT('%', LOWER(#{keyword}), '%') OR
LOWER(category) LIKE CONCAT('%', LOWER(#{keyword}), '%') )
AND price >= #{minPrice}
AND price <= #{maxPrice}
AND condition_level = #{conditionLevel}
AND location LIKE CONCAT('%', #{location}, '%')
AND FIND_IN_SET(category, #{category}) > 0
ORDER BY
relevance_score DESC,
created_at DESC
